00111     bool isSlotEnabled(unsigned int slot_i) const {
00112 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00113       assert(slot_i >=getFirstSlot() && slot_i<=getLastSlot() );
00114 #endif
00115       return static_cast<bool>( getSlotEnable() & (1<<slot_i));
00116     };
00117 
00118 
00120     ReadOutConfigurationBlock &setFeSlotEnable(int slotFeEnable, int pos) {
00121        obj()->setIntVal(kRoConfIntSlotFeEnable+pos, slotFeEnable); 
00122       return *this;
00123 
00124     }    
00125  
00127     int getFeSlotEnable(int pos) const {
00128         return getIntVal(kRoConfIntSlotFeEnable+pos);
00129     } 
00130 
00131 
00133     bool isFeEnabled(unsigned int slot_i, unsigned int fe_i) const {
00134 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00135       assert(slot_i >=getFirstSlot() && slot_i<=getLastSlot() );
00136       assert(fe_i < 8 );
00137 #endif
00138       unsigned int eff_slot_i=slot_i-getFirstSlot();
00139       // for each slot 2-22 one byte is used which are packed in 5 integers
00140       return static_cast<bool>( getFeSlotEnable(eff_slot_i/4) & ( 1<< (fe_i+(8*eff_slot_i%4)) ) );
00141     };
